SharingRecordCollectionMember.name: SharingRecordCollectionMember
SharingRecordCollectionMember.description: Represents a user with access to a collection of records.

AccessLevel.description: The access level on the related record collection.

CollectionId.description: The ID of the related record collection.

UserOrGroupId.description: The ID of the user or group with access to the record collection.
